code: import{DELETE_USER,GET_USERS}from"../types/usersType";var usersReducer=function usersReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_USERS:return action.payload;case DELETE_USER:return state.filter(function(item){return item._id!==action.payload;});default:return state;}};export default usersReducer;
